entry.title: project_job1 #10 (stable)
entry.content:
Job1 ------- Create new user called net4u Create new directory called net4u Put net4u user inside sudo group Create 5 files insede net4u folder and tgz them
sudo useradd net4u sudo usermod -a -G sudo net4u sudo mkdir /home/jenkins/net4u cd /home/jenkins/net4u sudo touch 1.txt 2.txt 3.txt 4.txt 5.txt sudo tar -zcvf net4u.tgz 1.txt 2.txt 3.txt 4.txt 5.txt echo "Done, up next job2"
